tax_brackets.source: Gemini Web Search, 2025-08-10, 'New Zealand income tax rates 1961'
tax_brackets.notes: NEEDS RESEARCH. The full bracket structure is unknown. The values here are approximations based on search results indicating a 'slight modification' of the 1954 tax scale. Without further details, the rates are assumed to be the same as 1960. The first £60 of interest income was exempt from taxation, which is not modelled here.

ietc.notes: Policy did not exist in this year (starts 2009).

wff.notes: Policy did not exist in this year (starts 2005).

ppl.notes: Policy did not exist in this year (starts 2002).

child_support.notes: Policy did not exist in this year (starts 1991).

acc_levy.source: Gemini Web Search, 2025-08-10, 'New Zealand income tax rates 1961'
acc_levy.notes: ACC scheme did not exist in this year.
